plazasingapura.name: Arteastiq DePatio
plazasingapura.description:
The Arteastiq Group announces the launch of our new, reformulated F&B brand concept, Arteastiq DePatio, specially crafted by our expert Chefs. The Courtyard Of Chefs showcases modern European street-style dishes, based on classic home-cooked recipes. Promising an unforgettable and gastronomical experience that will take your taste buds through scenes of Europe. 


From Pancetta Roast Pork Belly (a slab of savoury, juicy pork belly), Gemelli Parmigiana (traditional Italian cheese eggplant spaghetti), Paccheri Beer Butter (also known as beer pasta), Al Taglio Pizza (authentic, quality wood-fire baked pizza) to Flattened Potatoes. Be spoilt for choice and you will be coming back for more. The menu also offers a variety of flavoursome and mouth-watering dishes, refreshing tea concoctions, aromatic coffee and cocoa beverages as well as a good selection of red wine, white wine, champagne and cocktails.
plazasingapura.category:
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

plazasingapura.name: Auntie Anne's
plazasingapura.description:
Auntie Anne’s has become a favourite and household name in Singapore, and it all began at a farmer’s market in Pennsylvania in the year 1988. Anne Beiler and her husband, Jonas, sold an assortment of treats including hand-dolled, soft pretzels. Through experimenting different combinations of ingredients, Anne created an iconic masterpiece – the same freshly baked goodness you know and love today.


A fan favourite and must try is the Sour Cream and Onion flavoured pretzel, which has the savoury sour cream and onion powder dusted on the chewy yet firm pretzel. If you are craving for some sweet snacks, the Cinnamon sugar or Sweet Almond pretzel is the choice for you. The Sweet Almond pretzel is rich but not as sweet as the Cinnamon Sugar, and the almonds provide a satisfying crunch and additional nutty flavour. There are also dips available for a little extra indulgence. Pair your soft pretzels with Auntie Anne’s signature refreshing lemonade for a gratifying finish. 


Auntie Anne’s is more than the world’s largest soft pretzel franchise, it is also a business that is committed to giving back to the community that they serve. So, head on over to an Auntie Anne’s outlet in Singapore today for a delightful snack and contribute to a good cause!

plazasingapura.name: Bangkok Jam
plazasingapura.description:
Inspired by the “City of Angels”, Bangkok, Bangkok Jam offers a modern twist to traditional Thai cuisine introducing a contemporary culinary experience to Singapore, whilst still retaining the authenticity of the well-loved cuisine. Their winning formula comprises of modern cooking techniques, notable dishes, quality and fresh ingredients as well as their stylish interior design. Signatures include their Tom Yum Fried Rice with Seafood, Grilled Chicken Thigh with Lettuce Wrap, Grilled Pork Spare Ribs with Spicy Lime Dip, and more! Other remarkable dishes that will leave you wanting more also consists of Thai Fish Cakes, Stir-fried Squid in Salted Egg Sauce, Green Papaya Salad with Soft Shell Crab, and more! 


Just one taste of Bangkok Jam’s show-stopping specialities, complemented with pleasant dining atmosphere and warm hospitality of the service staff, you will not even need to fly to Bangkok to be immersed in the exotic foods and gracious “smiling culture”! Come experience it for yourself today at one of Singapore’s 5 outlets island-wide!

plazasingapura.name: Bashu Sichuan Cuisine
plazasingapura.description: Ba Shu Yan Yi is a restaurant specializing in Sichuan cuisine. Since 2015, we've been dedicated to serving authentic dishes loved by locals and tourists alike. Our chefs from Sichuan bring rich culinary experience and mastery of classic dishes like Green Pepper Fish and Spicy Chicken. Each dish is made with high-quality ingredients, preserving the authentic flavors of Sichuan. Our cozy restaurant is ideal for family gatherings, social events, or business dinners. We prioritize excellent service and delicious Sichuan cuisine. Visit Ba Shu Yan Yi to enjoy authentic Sichuan flavors in a warm and inviting atmosphere.

plazasingapura.name: Beard Papa's
plazasingapura.description:
Beard Papa bakes impossibly fragrant cream puffs bursting with flavored custard filling including unique flavors like Melon, Hazelnut Marshmallow and Peach Melba.



Originated from Japan, we are known as the World’s Best Cream Puffs since 1999, with more than 400 stores worldwide.
plazasingapura.category:
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Pastries , Cream Puffs

plazasingapura.name: Bengawan Solo
plazasingapura.description: Bengawan Solo preserves the time-honored taste of Singapore's local kuehs and confectionery by using traditional methods, the finest and freshest ingredients, and absolutely no artificial preservatives to replicate this homemade quality in our bakes. This passion and commitment to great taste, quality and freshness has made Bengawan Solo a household brand name in Singapore and a firm favourite with overseas visitors looking for a uniquely Singaporean premium food gift.

plazasingapura.name: Boost Juice Bars
plazasingapura.description: It's amazing that something so healthy can taste so good! Boost offers a huge, extra tasty range of low-fat green smoothies, freshly squeezed juices and dairy free crushes. All products are at least 98% fat-free and we never ever add artificial flavours, colours, sugar or water.

plazasingapura.name: BreadTalk
plazasingapura.description: BreadTalk is a Singaporean homegrown brand that has been imprinted fondly on Singapore’s food culture, firmly established as the go-to store for affordable and good quality variety of bread and cakes. Since its beginnings in 2000, BreadTalk honours the art of bread-making by giving life to their novel creations. They have no sign of slowing down as they continue to bring joy and goodness to satisfy every customer. BreakTalk’s premium and natural ingredients are carefully selected from global retailers such as procuring milled flour from Japan as well as pure butter from New Zealand. Pastes or fillings are made in the Central Kitchens at BreakTalk IHQ and the ingredients are specially processed from its raw states, so as to ensure greater quality control of the finished products. The best-selling buns include BreadTalk’s iconic Flosss Buns, the very bun that helped them gain traction in the hearts and tummies of many locals. There are also other creations like the Cheese Sausage and Cheese Boat buns, Bak Kwa Delight, as well as a variety of donut flavours. The products BreadTalk offers are made with a focus on creating perfect harmony among textures, flavours and ingredients. Stop by a BreadTalk outlet for a taste of Singapore’s favourite bakery now!

plazasingapura.name: BURGER KING
plazasingapura.description: Welcome to the home of flame-grilled perfection! Enjoy the best-selling, signature flame-grilled WHOPPER®️ as well as other top BK favourites such as the velvety smooth Double Mushroom Swiss, deliciously juicy Tendergrill®️ Chicken that is made of chicken thigh fillet and the irresistible sides such as Onion Rings, Taro Turnover, HERSHEY’S®️ Sundae Pie and more! Sink your teeth in our juicy burgers now!
plazasingapura.category:
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Burger And Fries , Fried Chicken , Snacks & Finger Food

plazasingapura.name: Canton Paradise
plazasingapura.description: Relish and experience the best of Hong Kong amidst a truly inimitable setting. Immerse in our pursuit of fine Cantonese cuisine with an extensive all-day menu offering from roast specialties, dim sum to delectable congee, noodles and wok-fried classics, fully captured in the essence of H.K cuisine.

plazasingapura.name: Cellarbration
plazasingapura.description: Since its launch in 2012, Cellarbration has been the online and retail destination for the largest selection of Wine, Spirits and Beers in Singapore and South East Asia region. It has achieved remarkable growth in these markets with its high online profile and a country-wide presence of 7 impressive retail locations around main districts in Singapore. We pride ourselves in being that One-Stop Beverage Solution by offering a wide range of services and including our customers into a space that shares a mutual interest, passion and enjoyment for liquor. Cellarbration has become the leading player in the fast-growing private liquor consumption sector, with a business model that combines great value, dependable personal service with our knowledgeable and friendly team, and an overall sense of lifestyle for all our valued customers.

plazasingapura.name: CHAGEE
plazasingapura.description: The story of CHAGEE first began in 2017 in the hometown of tea, Yunnan, China. Guided by the vision to connect everyone with a good cup of tea, the brand constantly innovates to provide healthy and delicious tea beverages to consumers. CHAGEE has since grown to over 4,500+ stores globally, with over 100+ stores across Malaysia, Singapore and Thailand. Its signature tea is Jasmine Green Milk Tea, which sells an average of over 100 million cups yearly.
plazasingapura.category:
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Tea , Milk Tea

aperia.name: Armoury
aperia.description:
Defining the fun steakhouse & bar for family and friends gatherings, dating, casual & business meet-ups, solo me-time.

​

With more good steaks, good happy hour and more casual comfort, Armoury serves premium steaks typically reserved for fine dining steakhouses.

​​

Featuring quality steak cuts including Hokkaido Wagyu, Australia Wagyu and Black Angus to enhance your casual dining experience

​​

A class above where extraordinary meets everyday.

aperia.description: Blanco Court Beef Noodles was founded back in 1979, offering traditional Hainanese style beef noodles. The same authentic recipe has been preserved and passed down since then. The secret behind the rich and bold taste lies in the herbal soup stock, which is also the key ingredient used for the gravy that comes with the dry version. Chef’s recommendation: Superior Beef Noodles, the ultimate bowl that comes with premium cut beef shank, tender beef slices, gourmet beef balls, soft, melt-in-your mouth beef tendons and springy beef tripe.

aperia.name: Carbon&
aperia.description: Carbon& is a craft beer restaurant. By day, we offer a range of dishes such as the Yakiniku Beef Bowl and tender Teriyaki Chicken Leg bowl that’s perfect for a hearty lunch. By night, the craft beers on tap starts flowing coupled with beer bites and Hakka-inspired bites that makes it a watering hole great for a post-work tipple.

aperia.description: Ichiho - Donburi & Sushi is a contemporary Japanese restaurant that delivers fresh seafood and premium fish everyday. We get our seafood directly from Japan, flown 2-3x a week keeping the seafood fresh til it reaches your tummy!

aperia.name: IM-EM Thai Kitchen
aperia.description: IM-EM Thai Kitchen bring about an array of Thai delicacies to the heart of Singapore.

aperia.name: Jollibean
aperia.description: Established in 1995, Jollibean uses only Grade A, non-GMO and single variety IP Canadian soy beans and strives to offer healthy soy-related beverages and street snacks made with the finest ingredients, in the freshest possible manner. Whether you are looking for a tasty, healthy snack or a delicious food & drink with dessert options, Jollibean and its wide range of soy bean products are here to please even the most diverse palates.

aperia.name: Kaeden Cafe
aperia.description: KAEDEN is Danish for chain or the centre of connection. This is reflected in our logo where a single chain runs through a bicycle. Food has an extraordinary ability to spark enjoyment and connection. We hope that our cafe brings you closer to your friends and family as you make conversation and merry over a hearty fare.

aperia.name: KOI THE

bedokmall.name: Bee Cheng Hiang
bedokmall.description: Bee Cheng Hiang has been passionately committed to making the best bakkwa since 1933. The home-grown brand uses the most natural and premium ingredients possible and maintains an unyielding position on rejecting the use of MSG, artificial preservatives, meat-tenderiser, colouring and flavouring. Known for its enterprising and innovative spirit, Bee Cheng Hiang has pioneered various products that have redefined the bakkwa industry, such as the Mini EZ Series (vacuum-packed bakkwa) and the EZ Mini Crunchies series (crunchy floss). Today, with more than 370 stores in 12 countries and regions, Bee Cheng Hiang is the largest bakkwa retailer globally.

Boost Juice - the nation’s favorite makers of fresh smoothies and juices! We serve millions of Singaporeans our iconic green cups, filled with fruit and veggies deliciousness.


Deliciousness that comes from simple, natural goodness, served to you with a love life attitude that will make you so happy you’ll probably end up high fiving random strangers.


It’s about making healthy living easy!! So naturally, nutrition is a key component in developing our range of smoothies and juices that sees us blending through millions of tonnes of fruit and veggies every year.


Don’t believe us? Let us prove it! Come and see us at Boost Juice and try it for yourself.

bedokmall.name: Canton Paradise
bedokmall.description:
Canton Paradise Restaurant sets out to capture the essence of Hong Kong with its offering of nostalgic Cantonese favourites and dim sum as well as an array of roast specialities. The extensive all-day menu offers an affordable selection of Hong Kong classics. Enjoy a taste of authenticity at this Chinese restaurant with an all-day menu of delectable dim sum. 


Try the Steamed Molten Salted Egg Yolk Custard Piggy Buns to liven things up at the table. These little buns shaped like cartoon pigs are almost too adorable to eat. Don’t let the cute exterior fool you though, the naturally sweet and savoury molten salted egg yolk lava will tantalise your taste buds.

bedokmall.name: Chateraise
bedokmall.description:
Châteraisé is the No.1 confectionery company in Japan.
 
The pastry shop has about 500 stores across Japan and over 40 stores in Asia. Chateraise is unique in featuring a wide variety of cakes, pastries, sweets and Japanese drinks. 
 
Treats from Châteraisé are made with specially selected fresh ingredients such as pure natural water from Hakushu area, and milk and eggs delivered directly from pastures and farms in Japan, with little or no preservatives.
bedokmall.category:
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

bedokmall.description: CHICHA San Chen (吃茶三千) was founded in 1998 with a mission to make high-quality freshly brewed teas accessible to discerning tea drinkers. Every cup is freshly brewed with an exclusively patented Teapresso machine, marrying the best of bubble tea with traditional tea.

bedokmall.name: COFFEESARANG
bedokmall.description:
Coffee Is A Lovely Energizer.


Coffee is a living energy for us to relax, think, remember, talk, listen, see, dream, and love.


Our COFFEESARANG is a place where customers can enjoy a special coffee or a zestful tea with delicious food such as Panini Sandwich, Waffle, Croissants as well as an Authentic Korean flavors' Dessert, BingSu.


We hope our customers are happy at our COFFEESARANG and be energized to do what they love.
bedokmall.category:

Coffee , Desserts , Korean Dessert , Sandwiches , Tea , Waffles

bedokmall.name: CRAVE/Stuff'd
bedokmall.description:
CRAVE is an establishment that houses the best of both worlds where the original Adam Road nasi lemak by Selera Rasa meets the Amoy Street teh tarik by Rafee’s Corner under one roof. The two household names have joined hands to create a spellbinding gourmet experience for Singaporeans.
Stuff'd - Deliciously grilled naturally marinated chicken is hand-rolled daily into rolls and rolls of humongous sized wraps, freshly prepared right in front of you. A delicious mix of nutritional natural goodness.
bedokmall.category:
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Asian Cuisine , Local Delights

bedokmall.name: Cut Butchery
bedokmall.description:
Cut Butchery is a family owned 5-Star butchery. As importers and distributors to restaurants across the island, we bring you high quality meats and deli products at highly competitive rates. We are known for our friendly and honest service, selecting only the day’s freshest meat for sale to our customers. 


Instilled as part of our core values, we only insist on antibiotics-free, hormone-free and nitrate-free meat products. With no preservatives and cancer causing nitrates, we provide one of the cleanest, natural meats in Singapore. Cut Butchery promises pocket friendly high quality selections.
bedokmall.category:
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Fresh Products , Marinated Meat , Poultry , Meat , Fresh & Frozen Food

bedokmall.name: Devil Chicken
bedokmall.description: Best Taiwanese fried chicken for the past 10 years! Standing out from the crowd with 25mm of extraordinarily thick chicken breast meat that is of unparalleled juiciness, the fried chicken cutlet created by Devil Chicken has a thin yet amazingly crispy outer layer to complement the succulent meat. With every crunch of excellence, the fried chicken cutlet created by Devil Chicken and its addictive menu have garnered a unique identity and strong following.
bedokmall.category:
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Fried Chicken Cutlet , Snacks & Finger Food , Taiwanese Food

bedokmall.name: Dian Xiao Er
bedokmall.description:
Dian Xiao Er - the must eat herbal roast duck in Singapore!



Using only the finest quality of Cherry Valley ducks paired with freshest ingredients, our duck are prepared and freshly roast daily. They are marinated with a revitalising blend of Chinese herbs and spices for hours, roasted at a precise temperature to retain its juice while in the oven. Crisp to the touch, and golden brown in appearance, our herbal roast duck is complemented with our specially concocted herbal sauce that makes it impossible to resist!

bedokmall.name: Duke Bakery
bedokmall.description: Duke Bakery has created over 60 different innovative kinds of delicious breads. Ingeniously incorporating the Japanese style of light and soft bread textures together with classic European style baking of using yeast from fermented fruits, Duke Bakery delivers a rich, healthy and varied foodscape that you definitely do not want to miss.

bugisjunction.name: 108 Matcha Saro
bugisjunction.description: 108 Matcha Saro originates from Asahikawa, Hokkaido Japan. Well-loved for its mouth- watering Obanyaki, Parfait, Warabi mochi and Soft Serve Ice-Cream cone, what sets 108 Matcha Saro apart from its peers is the authenticity and quality of its key ingredients.

bugisjunction.name: Ajisen Ramen
bugisjunction.description:
Ajisen Ramen has been operating since 1968 and is popular for its flavourful Tonkotsu (pork bone) broth. First launched in Kumamoto, Japan, Ajisen Ramen has more than 700 restaurants worldwide, with 20 outlets in Singapore alone. They are the world’s largest Ramen Chain, famed as the “World Ramen”, and aim to operate 1,000 restaurants globally. 


The Tonkostsu soup in Ajisen Ramen is made with ingredients imported from Japan, and their ramen noodles are house-made, which, when briefly cooked, stay smooth and bouncy to taste. Not to mention, Ajisen Ramen’s Tonkotsu soup has anti-ageing qualities due to the amount of collagen immersed in the soup. Collagen, a protein largely found in connective tissues, cartilage and bone, makes up a significant percentage of the 60 trillion body cells and can be considered the essence of life. 


Ajisen Ramen does not neglect taste either, Kumamoto Ramen features Senmiyu, a brown sauce, accompanying the Tonkotsu soup, which has all its flavours expertly sealed into the sauce, assuring you will be hooked on their combination of Tonkotsu and Senmiya. So be prepared to be spoilt for choice with Ajisen Ramen’s extensive ramen variety when you visit any outlet in Singapore.
bugisjunction.category:
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Japanese Cuisine , Sushi , Ramen

bugisjunction.name: ALLEY.WEI TEPPAN-YAKI
bugisjunction.description: ALLEY.WEI TEPPAN-YAKI uses the traditional way of serving, where food is cooked on a hot plate table in front of diners by trained chefs and served directly to the plate in a much more efficient method.

bugisjunction.name: Bakery 1946
bugisjunction.description: Bakery 1946 is a traditional Korean bakery where skilled artisans meticulously craft each loaf of bread, investing time and effort to produce healthy, universally loved bread. Their dedication shines through in every piece of bread.

bugisjunction.name: Bengawan Solo
bugisjunction.description:
Bengawan Solo is a homegrown brand that started in 1979 as Bengawan Solo Cake Shop in Marine Terrace by Tjendri Anastasia. What began as a simple interest in Indonesian delicacies became a full-blown entrepreneurship when her cakes and kuehs gained popularity amongst family and friends. 


Bengawan Solo uses traditional methods of production and the only finest quality ingredients to prepare delicacies without preservatives. Even at the centralised kitchen, many of Bengawan Solo's products are still handmade or completed by hand in order to maintain the authenticity and standard of what they deliver to their customers. Kuehs like Ondeh Ondeh and Kueh Dadar are handmade throughout the process daily before distributing the finished products to other outlets across Singapore. Bengawan Solo’s signature range also includes Pandan Chiffon Cake, Lapis Sagu, Kueh Lapis and Pineapple Tarts. Anastasia takes pride in producing the best Indonesian and local cakes as well as kuehs. Bengawan Solo continues to introduce new recipes and improve existing ones in order to keep their menu interesting. 


With 38 outlets and over 409 employees in Singapore, Bengawan Solo is not going to stop bringing traditional treats to you anytime soon!

bugisjunction.name: Best Ah Ma Cafe by Tin Box
bugisjunction.description:
Best Ah Ma Cafe by Tin Box is a collaboration between Tin Box Group and the beloved Malaysian Kopitiam, Best Ah Ma Cafe (好家婆). 


Explore the nostalgic charm of Best Ah Ma Cafe by Tin Box and immerse in the ambience of an authentic, traditional Kopitiam-inspired cafe. From the irresistible aroma of our kaya butter toast to the comforting flavours of our fragrant Nasi Lemak, each dish is a tribute to our rich local food culture. Complement your meal with our selection of aromatic local ‘kopi’ and ‘teh’. 


At Best Ah Ma Cafe, cherished memories and delicious cuisine come together to create an unforgettable dining experience.

bugisjunction.name: Big Fish Small Fish
bugisjunction.description:
Big Fish Small Fish is a unique Fish & Crisps café offering our customers a Fish and Chips meal amid a dining experience that is engaging and fun. This is the first of its kind in Singapore, originated in Punggol operating from shipping containers in a serene lush greenery setting. 


Big Fish Small Fish offers a variety of fishes such as Salmon, Seabass and Dory that is prepared upon order in a light and crispy batter. They come with a generous portion of freshly sliced potato crisps. 


There is also a Today’s Catch, where they offer fresh fish as a premium selection while stock last. Diners may also complement their meals with add-ons like Calamari and Garlic Butter Mussels. They also offer desserts (Churros) for a complete meal. The highlight would be the free flow of sauces and dips available. The favourites are Cheese Sauce, Salted Egg Sauce and Curry Sauce. These sauces enhance the Fish & Crisps meal and are simply addictive, making one crave for more as they dine.

bugisjunction.name: Boost Juice Bars
bugisjunction.description: It's amazing that something so healthy can taste so good! Boost offers a huge, extra tasty range of low-fat green smoothies, freshly-squeezed juices and dairy-free crushes. All products are at least 98% fat-free, and we never ever add artificial flavours, colours, sugar or water.

bugisjunction.name: Bulgogi Syo
bugisjunction.description: Get ready for a new dining concept brought to you by the K-BBQ Artisans at Seorae. They bring you Bulgogi Syo - a brand new dining experience where the Perfect Fire (Bul) and Perfect Meat (Gogi) comes together to offer you the Perfect Experience (Syo/Show).

bugisjunction.name: Buta Kizoku
bugisjunction.description: With a wide selection of Japanese Kushiyaki 串焼き, ranging from Yakiton やきとん to Yakitori 焼き鳥, head over to Buta Kizoku for premium quality Japanese Skewers all within your pockets! And if you're feeling it, you have to pair those jumbo skewers with their alcohol selection!
bugisjunction.category:
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Food & Beverage , Japanese Cuisine

bugisjunction.name: BUTTER STUDIO
bugisjunction.description:
Butter Studio is a Halal-certified bakery in Singapore that sells artisanal home-style bakes inspired by recipes passed down from generations before. Their handmade goods are produced with high-quality ingredients such as farm-fresh eggs, local market produce and seasonal fruits. Butter Studio celebrates honest and delicious handcrafted treats with an appreciation for the community they serve. 


Butter Studio offers their award-winning Salted Caramel Red Velvet, which is a local fan favourite that has layers of red velvet, cream cheese frosting and house-made sea salt caramel sauce. Other popular choices include the Sea Salt Nutella tart, Milo Speculoos Fudge and Salted Gula Melaka cupcake. Seasonal items are also available monthly, while special Butter Studio collections are offered during the holiday seasons. 


At their bakery café, brunch specialty poached eggs, hearty dinner burgers and delightful desserts are made from scratch with fresh market produce daily. Their Crabby Eggs Neptune and Wasabi Eggs Royale are recommended items on the menu. 


Satisfy your sweet tooth and drop by Butter Studio's outlet in Singapore for your next sweet fix!
bugisjunction.category:
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

bugisjunction.name: Crystal Jade La Mian Xiao Long Bao
bugisjunction.description:
Crystal Jade is renowned for their one-Michelin star restaurant and holds numerous Michelin Bib Gourmand awards. This restaurant has been a household name in Singapore, and its popularity can be felt by the range of outlets it has opened on Singapore’s shores. Besides, Crystal Jade also operates upwards of 100 stores in 25 major cities and is recognised for their high regard for quality as well as culinary mastery. The brand aims to broaden the impression of Chinese cuisine and to ensure that the Chinese culture is conserved fittingly. 


Their menu is curated to incorporate contemporary gastronomy as well as the essence of Chinese cuisine in a manner that is new and rejuvenating. Crystal Jade La Mian offers a range of delicious dishes from appetisers to traditional handmade La Mian as well as Jiangnan-style food. Kick off your appetite with their Spicy Japanese Cucumber, Beancurd with Pork Floss or Chilled Chicken Marinated with Chinese Wine. Some of their popular La Mian choices include Chilled La Mian with spicy chicken, preserved egg and cucumber, La Mian with peanut sauce in Szechuan style as well as La Mian with braised beef belly in spicy soup. Dig into Jiangnan’s classic food fare like Deep-fried Crispy Duck, Braised Pork Belly with Pancake, Deep-fried Spare Rib with Crispy Garlic in addition to Sautéed Chicken in Spicy Sauce and Macadamia Nut. There are also an array of dim sum and fried rice options to savour. 


Dine at Crystal Jade La Mian in Singapore for a taste of authentic Shanghainese and provincial dishes today!

bugisjunction.name: Daily Chicken
bugisjunction.description:
Daily Chicken, the latest dining brand from Katrina Group, was conceptualized in partnership with Daily Beer following the successful launch of the leading South Korean craft beer and fried chicken brand’s first international outlet in Singapore. Known for its mouth-watering Korean fried chicken, Daily Chicken now brings an exclusive Korean street food menu with non-spicy options perfect for everyone. 


Daily Chicken, an authentic, family-friendly casual restaurant, uses ingredients imported directly from Korea. Daily Chicken offers not only its signature crispy fried chicken in irresistible flavours but also exciting dishes like Chicken Gangjeong, Gimbap, and Chewy or Crispy Hotteok. For office professionals looking to unwind, they can relish the Singapore-exclusive K-Ginseng Lager, brewed with whole Korean ginseng and designed to revitalise and uplift. New non-alcoholic drinks have also been created specifically for Daily Chicken, perfect for the whole family to enjoy. 


Located at Bugis Junction, Daily Chicken is set to spread its wings with more outlets in convenient locations soon. Come and taste the difference – it’ll be love at first bite!

bugisplus.description:
Astons was started with a simple aim – to bring quality yet affordable Western cuisine to diners everywhere in Singapore. Since 2005, Astons has been providing great food at reasonable prices, carving its name and popularity into the hearts of Singaporeans who often patronise the causal dining establishment. 



They offer an extensive menu that utilises the freshest and best quality ingredients, providing a satisfying experience for everyone. For starters, the Cream of Mushroom Soup is a good option and it comes with a slice of toasted fragrant garlic bread to tantalise your appetite. Other than their popular Prime Ribeye that is juicy and cooked to your preferred doneness, the Chargrilled Chicken is also a fan favourite. The chicken is succulent and perfectly grilled so that the charred parts bring out the taste of the chicken and paired with their sauce flavourfully. Another must try includes the Honey Bourbon Ribs which is slathered generously with BBQ sauce and so tender the meat slides right off the bones. Most main courses include 2 side dishes and there are other seafood and pasta options available in their menu as well. 


Visit Astons outlet in Singapore today for a great food along with great company!

Enhanced by its distinctive blue (AZUL) interior, AZUL invites you to experience the richness of these culinary treasures, even if you are not watching a movie!

bukitpanjangplaza.name: Ah Ma Chi Mian
bukitpanjangplaza.description: A heritage brand inspired by the founder's grandmother, Ah Ma Chi Mian serves up a contemporary twist to the well-loved minced meat noodles while preserving tradition. For lovers of "Bak Chor Mee", Ah Ma Chi Mian's soup is a definite must try as the broth is loaded with minced pork which adds a layer of sweetness, coupled with skillfully cooked noodles, garnished with anchovies and herbs. Each bowl of minced meat noodles is tossed with their secret sauce, served with delicious meatballs and fishballs.

bukitpanjangplaza.name: Andes by Astons
bukitpanjangplaza.description:
ANDES BY ASTONS is a Halal Certified casual dining restaurant in Singapore and a spinoff of ASTONS Specialties, but it is still branded in the customary cowboy theme. ASTONS is popular for its “Value-For-Money” concept and ANDES continues to offer the best value and quality of food to all diners. 



ANDES uses quality ingredients and provides generous portions, guaranteed to satisfy your taste buds and wallets. Their menu features an extensive selection of steak cuts, seafood and chicken with most of the main courses including 2 side dishes that diners can select from a range of options to suit their cravings. The Prime Ribeye or Sirloin is a popular choice with its succulent texture, cooked to your desired doneness, which at its inexpensive price point is definitely worth a try. The Hickory BBQ Chicken is tender and juicy, pairing nicely with the smokey and sweet Hickory sauce. There are also fish options such as their Chargrilled Salmon Fillet that is charred enticingly yet does not dry out the salmon. If one main meat is not enough for you, opt for the Super Combo that offers an extra variety, like the Surf & Turf which comes with Prime Ribeye and Prawns, also including 2 side dishes. 


So if you're feeling the hunger pangs for hearty western grub then head down to any ANDES outlet across Singapore today. For there is definitely something to delight all!

At Arabisk, we are on a mission to bring the authentic flavors of the Mediterranean to Singapore. Our menu is inspired by the rich and vibrant flavors of the Middle East and North Africa, with a focus on healthy and wholesome dishes.


We are committed to using fresh, natural and locally sourced ingredients to create dishes that are not only delicious but also provide a healthy and balanced diet. Whether you’re looking for a light lunch, an indulgent dinner or a tasty snack, come by and experience the unique flavors of Arabisk.

Known for its enterprising and innovative spirit, Bee Cheng Hiang has pioneered various products that have redefined the bakkwa industry, such as the Mini EZ Series (vacuum-packed bakkwa) and the EZ Mini Crunchies series (crunchy floss). Today, with more than 370 stores in 12 countries and regions, Bee Cheng Hiang is the largest bakkwa retailer globally.

funan.name: Afuri
funan.description:
Afuri was first started by Hiroto Nakamura in Tokyo in 2003 and has expanded the brand internationally to stores in Portugal and Canada. Takahashi Kenichi, CEO of Japan Foods Holding, had worked to bring Afuri to Singapore since 2012. His vision was finally realised seven years later, with the launch of Afuri ramen + dumplings in Singapore.

 

Afuri stands out from its competitors by making their signature ramen with yuzu, a small citrus fruit native to Asia. They are also crafted authentically to Japan’s specification, producing ramen that is thin, light and refined. Afuri ramen are soaked in broth boiled with ingredients such as chicken, kombu and dried bonito. A dash of yuzu in the broth delivers a refreshing twist to the taste of the dish entirely. The pork slices that top the ramen are cooked over lava stones locally, as compared to being grilled with charcoal in Japan, yet the depth of the flavour is still preserved. For a satisfying side dish, opt for Afuri’s dumplings that comes in a layer of crispy thin crust covering the bottom.

 

Afuri not only aims to share their passion for the process of producing quality and well-made food, but also to do their part in contributing to the community and so much more. Just as they are named after Mt. Afuri that stands steadfast and dependable, Afuri restaurant has one belief: “One ramen. One staff. Always Higher.” So make your way to their outlet in Singapore today for a hot piping bowl of ramen!

funan.name: Flavours by Saute
funan.description:
Flavours by Sauté is the latest venture by Sauté and serves fusion vegetarian and vegan food in Singapore. They aim to create a homely and cosy environment for families and friends to bond over an enjoyable meal. Whether your lifestyle gears towards veganism, health conscious diets or anything in between, Flavours by Sauté has something for you.

 

Flavours by Sauté crafts their food from natural ingredients that are wholesome, nutritious and of the best quality. All their dishes do not contain garlic or onion, and are meat-free. One of their bestsellers is the Orh Luak, which comes in Sichuan Mala, Quinoa and the chef recommended Truffle flavour as well. Give their Nyonya Otah Cutlet Quinoa Rice a try, it is free of mock-meat and offers house-made baked Nyonya Otah Cutlet instead! Their Laksa Lion Mane Spaghetti is a popular choice and Singapore fan favourite as well, with a creamy, nostalgic Laksa base and sautéed lion mane mushrooms for a chewy touch. To round up your meal, the Gula Melaka Latte and Caramel Swiss Carrot Cake with Ice-cream are good choices to indulge in.

 

Visit Singapore’s Flavours by Sauté for great tasting Earth-based cuisine today!

imm.name: Ajisen Ramen
imm.description: Ajisen Ramen has been operating since 1968 and is popular for its flavourful Tonkotsu (pork bone) broth. First launched in Kumanoto, Japan, Ajisen Ramen currently has more than 700 restaurants located around the world, with 20 outlets in Singapore alone. They are the world’s largest Ramen Chain, famed as the “World Ramen” and aims to operate 1000 restaurants globally. The Tonkostsu soup in Ajisen Ramen is made with ingredients imported from Japan, and their ramen noodles are house made, which, when briefly cooked, stay smooth and bouncy to taste. Not to mention, Ajisen Ramen’s Tonkotsu soup has anti-ageing qualities due to the amount of collagen immersed in the soup. Collagen, a protein largely found in connective tissues, cartilage and bone, makes up a significant percentage of the 60 trillion body cells and can be considered the essence of life. Ajisen Ramen does not neglect taste either, Kumamoto Ramen features Senmiyu; a brown sauce, accompanying the Tonkotsu soup, that has all its flavours expertly sealed into the sauce, assuring you will be hooked on their combination of Tonkotsu and Senmiya. So be prepared to be spoilt for choice with Ajisen Ramen’s extensive ramen variety when you visit any outlet in Singapore.

imm.name: BALIthai
imm.description:
Staying true to its slogan, “Thairiffic meets Indolicious,” Bali Thai’s team had crafted out an exquisite menu to bring out the best in Thai and Indonesian dishes in Singapore, delivering the perfect fusion of the two cuisines under one roof. Contrary to other fusion restaurants whereby cuisines are merged into completely new dishes, Bali Thai offers perennial food favourites from both Thai and Indonesian cultures, including the famous “Tauhu Telur”, “Combi Bakar”, “Pla Rad Prik” and more. Best sellers also include rich-tasting Assam Curry Fish Head, palatable Seafood BBQ Platter, flavourful Pandan Leaf Chicken and many more! 


Apart from the single main courses found on the food menu, there are also a wide range of selection for group and family diners, ranging from appetisers to set meals, some of which includes Thai Prawn and Fish Cakes, and 2-10 Pax set menus. 


With these mouth-watering and must-try dishes, in combination with being immersed in the cosy restaurant ambience, it is sure to leave you coming back for more! Come by any Bali Thai outlet in Singapore for a fusion feast today!

We have currently expanded overseas to locations including Malaysia, Indonesia, and South Korea, recognized for its commitment to culinary excellence and exceptional dining experiences. With a rich history and a reputation for innovation, BANTIANYAO has established itself as a leader in the Chinese catering industry. 


As part of our ongoing expansion and commitment to bringing our unique flavors and dining experiences to a global audience, we are excited to announce plans to open a branch in Singapore. Our foray into the Singaporean market underscores our ambition to cater to diverse palates and to be a part of the vibrant culinary tapestry of the region.

imm.description: Fragrance was created by Madam Ong who was encouraged by the passion and optimism of Singapore’s newfound independence in 1969. Not to mention, their tantalising barbecued selection and classic local snacks are manufactured right on Singapore’s shores. At Fragrance, all products are produced in Singapore using only the best quality of ingredients, ensuring consistency and hygiene standards are meticulously maintained. Madam Ong’s effort and diligence succeeded with her iconic formula, where the divine scent of her Bak Kwa attracts Singaporeans from all walks of life. Fragrance offers products from Bak Kwa, Chinese Sausages and Cuttlefish to Pastries, Mooncakes and a variety of Tau Sar Piah flavours. Some of their Bak Kwa options include Singapore Sliced Tender Bak Kwa, Chicken Bak Kwa, Gold Coin Bak Kwa and even Crocodile Bak Kwa for those who possess adventurous taste buds. There are also 4 types of Floss, Pork Floss, Chicken Floss, Fish Floss and Crispy Pork Floss for customers to choose from. Hence, we have other soup bases such as Mushroom, Pork bone, Tomato and Pickled Vegetable soup bases for those who do not enjoy spices. imm.name: Hainan Second Street
imm.description: Hainan Second Street is the masterpiece of a group of Hainanese brothers aspiring to spread the love for our heritage food to the Singaporean community. We have taken it upon ourselves to share with Singaporeans delicious fare fine-tuned through generations of Hainanese culinary excellence. Combined with our authentic Hainanese setting, we endeavour to build a nostalgic environment – a place where people can gather and experience genuity. With time passing us by and traditions being forsaken, the best way to preserve our culture and keep to our roots is by staying true to the flavours and style of dining. junction8.description:
Specializing in aburi or partially grilled meat, Aburi-EN offers a variety of high-quality donburi (rice bowls) at affordable prices in a comfortable and affable ambiance. Aburi-EN takes pride in its homemade umami-packed meat sauce, as well as the high-quality imported pork and the A4/A5 Miyazaki Wagyu it uses which has won Japan’s “National Wagyu Award” four consecutive times. 


At Aburi-EN, you can enjoy Japanese drinking culture with an extensive selection of Japanese cocktails, highballs, shochu and sake that complements the array of grilled meats. Focusing on premium ingredients grilled to perfection and offered at affordable prices, it’s little wonder why Aburi-EN is a favourite amongst many.

junction8.name: Ambush
junction8.description: Ambush was founded by Stanley Ng, who was first introduced to authentic European food in Luzerne, Switzerland. The wonderful experience gained from eating in restaurants and cafes was the beginning of his vision to introduce a new venture of European cuisine to Singapore. What started as a interim food kiosk in 2002 became 3 kiosk in 2003, which eventually gave rise to a union of the stores across Singapore in 2005 creating a small yet superbly formed eatery, Ambush. The path to creating a Singapore-wide chain of affordable, high quality and informal European restaurants was paved. Ambush offers a weekday lunch set menu and a usual ala carte menu, as well as a brunch selection on the weekends. From salads to tapas and Spanish paellas, be spoilt for choice when you dine at Ambush where you can have a taste of authentic European cuisine without stepping a foot out of Singapore. The Pear and Peach Salad is a chef recommended dish with walnuts, spinach, tomatoes, onion and balsamic oil that makes a tasty yet well-balanced meal. Be sure to give their seafood paella a try, with risotto, shrimps, pancetta, parmigiano, edamame and red pepper coulis, it is guaranteed to tantalize your taste buds. Visit any Ambush outlet in Singapore for a selection of excellent European dishes in a modern and friendly setting today!

With their Specialty Cakes, one piece is never enough, indulge in a whole Chocolate Origin cake that comes in two options – subtly sweet ORIGINAL and bitter DARK. The Cuppa Lava Cake is a glorious treat featuring a warm chocolate cake on top of vanilla ice cream, with hot molten chocolate lava flowing out from within the cake. From freshly brewed artisan lattes to ice chocolate shakes, Chocolate Origin’s beverages are prepared lovingly and earnestly, allowing you to enjoy a pleasant refreshment anytime. junction8.description: Daun Pandan Rice Dumplings is a family business that has been in operation for generations. The traditional triangular shaped glutinous rice dumplings filled with various ingredients which are then wrapped in pandan leaves are their specialty and most popular item. All outlets in Singapore offer a selection of Rice Dumplings, from Nonya to Hokkien, Teochew and Vegetarian dumplings. Daun Pandan Rice Dumplings’ introduced a product recently, their Black Pepper Chicken Dumpling, which features a delightful peppery hint that is sure to tantalise your taste buds. There are also meatless options like the Vegetarian Nonya Dumpling as well as the Peanut Vegetarian Dumpling, which are also guaranteed to satisfy your dumpling cravings. For the sweet tooth customers, Daun Pandan Rice Dumplings Kee Chang and Kee Chang with Red Bean are the ideal choices, especially when enjoyed with a sprinkle of sugar. Not to mention, they offer other freshly made delights like Tea Egg, Cup Corn, Tutu Kueh, Muah Chee and Wah Koh Kueh as well. junction8.description: Since its inception in 2002, Dian Xiao Er has grown into one of the most renowned household names in Singapore – famed for its Herbal Roast Ducks and mouth-watering specials such as the Pan-Fried Cod Fish and Wheatgrass Tofu. The brand prides itself on dishing out nutritious and balanced quality meals, which explains a menu brimming with a wide array of meat, seafood, and vegetables. junction8.name: Din Tai Fung
junction8.description:
World-renowned Taiwanese restaurant – Din Tai Fung was established in the Shanxi Province of China in 1927 by gourmet food doyen – Yang Bing-Yi. In recognition of the restaurant’s passion for culinary excellence, Din Tai Fung has been conferred several titles such as the one-Michelin star award and has been crowned as one of the World’s Top Ten Restaurants in 1993 by The New York Times. The franchise has since expanded to over 119 restaurants in countries such as Japan, China, Macau, Singapore, Malaysia and the United States. 


Throughout its 40 year history of serving Taiwanese delicacies, one of Din Tai Fung’s most notable dish would be the Steamed Pork Dumplings – Xiao Long Bao. Beneath the delicately pleated dough encompasses marinated minced pork oozing a rich gelatinised broth of goodness. To elucidate the restaurant’s purse for perfection, each soup dumpling is delicately crafted with the 18-fold technique cand weighed for accuracy. Din Tai Fung Chefs also undergo proficiency tests every 3 months to ensure that they upkeep the highly-exalted food standards. 


Come by Din Tai Fung at Junction 8 for an amazing meal today!

lotone.description: Four Leaves began with their first outlet in Singapore in 1981 on Nutmeg Road and has since grown to over 30 outlets strong. They have launched their Central Factory and retail outlets all across Singapore’s heartlands. Four Leaves has also expanded their operations to multiple brands such as Epi d’Or, Country Brot and St Leaven as well as a subsidiary branch in Malaysia. At Four Leaves, a variety of baked products and cakes are made with the latest Japanese machinery, novel ideas and a commitment to quality. Their ingredients like premium wheat flour are sourced from the most trustworthy manufacturer and handled expertly, ensuring all stages are approached with utmost excellence. Four Leaves offers all sorts of bread and cakes, from Mini Buns to Dry Items and Packaged Sandwiches. The Mini Buns features selections like Little Tuna Buns, Little Coffee Friend, Little Almond Cream Cheese and Little Egg Roll among others. There are also other bread items such as Healthy Tuna Bun, Siopan, Croissant and Bak Kwa Blossom. Some of their Signature cakes include the Original Strawberry Cake, Strawberry Shortcake, Almond FruitsTop and Blackforest Classic besides other creamy and rich creations. Come by a Four Leaves outlet and grab yourself a bag of delightful baked goods now!

Bread , Cake , Pastries , Sandwiches

lotone.name: Fun Toast
lotone.description:
Fun Toast started in 1941, by founders who mastered the craft of roasting Nanyang coffee and Singapore’s iconic charcoal grilled kaya toasts. This unassuming yet charming coffeeshop was first opened on Telok Ayer Street as Kheng Nam Hong, but has since evolved from a traditional family Coffeehouse to an innovative and uniquely Singaporean Coffeehouse. 


At Fun Toast, the pleasing aroma of brewed coffee and tea fills the eatery, while their delicious traditional Nanyang food and beverages captivates diners across Singapore. Their Fun Toast Sets, that come with a drink and eggs, include the Signature Yuan Yang Soft Bun, featuring a combination of Kaya and Peanut Butter spread, Kaya Butter Toast, French toast as well as Chicken Toastburger. Their Fun Meal boasts a more hearty selection of dishes, like their Signature Soya Sauce Chicken with Rice or Chee Cheong Fun, Curry Chicken with Rice or Soft Bun as well as Mee Siam and Beef Rendang. Fun Toast offers Fun Delights such as Soft Bread, Assorted Bao and Nasi Lemak too. Give their refreshing Red Cane Leaf for a quick lung and stomach heat relief, the drink is even topped with bits of water chestnut! 


Visit Fun Toast for a taste of traditional Nanyang favourites today!
lotone.category:
PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Asian Cuisine , Coffee , Tea , Toast , Local Delights

lotone.name: Gong Cha
lotone.description:
The essence of Gong Cha, or Tribute Tea, originated from the provision of the most premium and refined teas to the Emperor of China. It represents the highest quality and expectations of beverages. Established in Taiwan in 2006, Gong Cha has become deeply appreciated by its customers, gaining global renown by word of mouth and a uniquely customised service.


Today, Gong Cha outlets around the world number near 1,500, having become a widespread sensational concept among various consumers. Gong Cha’s story is one that roots itself as one of the most reliable providers of quality tea in the world.

rafflescity.name: Anti:dote
rafflescity.description:
Anti:dote is a stylishly modern cocktail bar in Singapore with a selection of concoctions that never fails to impress and appeals to the most discerning of taste buds. Classic recipes are reconceptualised with a contemporary flair while the mastery of traditional bartending and the artisanship of experimental mixology techniques are merged. At Anti:dote, drinks crafted with premium spirits and housemade bitters, liqueurs and sodas are paired perfectly with innovative modern tapas. 


Anti:dote is also loved by many Singaporeans for serving afternoon treats in its iconic pristine white chest of drawers, accompanied by more than 30 types of loose leaf teas which are a courtesy of TWG Tea Company. Begin your afternoon tea with your preferred set, which is between the Anti:dote tea, the oriental tea and the regal tea. Each offers its own unique appetizers such as the Anti:Dote black truffle scrambled eggs, 3 kinds of dim sum and smoked salmon with caviar. The drawers are filled with pastries and savoury bites such as Earl Grey Éclair, Warm Raisin and Candied Ginger scones as well as Boston Lobster Rolls. They even offer a Children’s Tea set which includes peanut butter and jelly sandwiches and similar finger foods. 


Plan your next relaxing afternoon or chill night at Anti:Dote today!

rafflescity.name: Asia Grand Restaurant
rafflescity.description: Asia Grand Restaurant serves authentic Cantonese cuisines. Their menu offers an extensive range of unpretentious traditional Cantonese dishes that reflects our Hong Kong origins. With specially sourced ingredients and exceptional culinary technique, they provide a truly fine dining Asia Grand experience.

rafflescity.name: Asian Market Cafe
rafflescity.description:
Asian Market Café has returned with a newly refurbished interior that is reminiscent of the black and white charm of Singapore’s historical colonial-style homes. With a 5-star Crescent Rating as a Halal-friendly hotel under Fairmont Singapore’s belt, feast on a spread of beloved local dishes and contemporary regional delicacies that boasts the authentic Halal-certified pan-Asian cuisine.


There are many live action stations where chefs cook the dishes on the spot; dishes like pratas and satays are made fresh at your order so that you can enjoy the utmost flavour. Be sure to try the Thai style roasted beef which is an Asian take on the classic western roast that will titillate your taste buds. The seafood selection ranges from sashimi to shell fish and chili crabs, which will no doubt satisfy your seafood cravings. Round up your meal with tropical fruits and a mixture of Asian desserts. The Durian Pengat is a fan favourite with its creamy texture and rich taste. You can even venture to build your own Ice Kachang and Chendol at the stations available in the desserts section.


Head on over to Asian Market Café today for a satisfying and sumptuous meal!

rafflescity.name: Awfully Chocolate
rafflescity.description: Awfully Chocolate made its start in Singapore in 1998 and began with a focus on cakes, more specifically chocolate cakes. There was only one cake – a simple dark chocolate cake between layers of dark chocolate fudge. One that is rich in taste yet moist and light, not just mousse and not overly sweet but something you would crave for and never tire of. Awfully Chocolate has since added more variety of desserts into their menu, becoming a place for the enjoyment of sweet treats. Their products are handmade daily from scratch with premium quality chocolate to ensure only the best are shared with you. Their signature Chocolate Peanut Butter Cake is a dark chocolate cake layered with creamy peanut butter sprinkled with nibbles of caramel crunch. A fan favourite is the Salted Butterscotch Brownie that is chewy and thick, especially with the handmade butterscotch on top and in the centre. The natural sea salt elevates its salty-sweet finish. Besides cakes, Awfully Chocolate is also popular for their Hei Ice Cream, which is made with the best Belgian chocolate and 100% Dutch fresh milk. It is produced with a low overrun to ensure it has a rich and dense flavour. Treat yourself to luxurious chocolate desserts at any Awfully Chocolate outlet in Singapore today!

PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Chocolate , Cake , Pastries

rafflescity.name: Bacha Coffee
rafflescity.description: The story of Bacha Coffee begins in 1910 in Marrakech at the spectacular Dar el Bacha palace. Today, Bacha Coffee provides customers with a unique opportunity to travel the world through their cup by exploring over 200 varieties of 100% Arabica coffees from 35 of the most well reputed producing countries. Enhance your at-home coffee ritual, elevate your takeaway experience or find the perfect gift amongst the beautifully crafted packed coffees, gift hampers, and timeless coffee accessories.

rafflescity.name: Bee Cheng Hiang
rafflescity.description: Bee Cheng Hiang has been passionately committed to making the best bakkwa since 1933. The home-grown brand uses the most natural and premium ingredients possible and maintains an unyielding position on rejecting the use of MSG, artificial preservatives, meat-tenderiser, colouring and flavouring. Known for its enterprising and innovative spirit, Bee Cheng Hiang has pioneered various products that have redefined the bakkwa industry, such as the Mini EZ Series (vacuum-packed bakkwa) and the EZ Mini Crunchies series (crunchy floss). Today, with more than 370 stores in 12 countries and regions, Bee Cheng Hiang is the largest bakkwa retailer globally.

Bak Kwa , Pork Floss

rafflescity.name: Bengawan Solo
rafflescity.description: Bengawan Solo preserves the time-honored taste of Singapore's local kuehs and confectionery by using traditional methods, the finest and freshest ingredients, and absolutely no artificial preservatives to replicate this homemade quality in our bakes. This passion and commitment to great taste, quality and freshness has made Bengawan Solo a household brand name in Singapore and a firm favourite with overseas visitors looking for a uniquely Singaporean premium food gift.

rafflescity.name: Boost Juice Bars
rafflescity.description: Boost Juice Bar originates from Australia in the year 2000, born out of a desire for healthier alternatives to fast food. In 6 years, Boost opened over 250 shops worldwide, before landing in Singapore in 2006 and expanding to 16 shops locally. The menu was created through consulting naturopaths and nutritionists, ensuring their wholesome juices and smoothies are free of artificial flavours, colours and preservatives. Boost passionately innovates products to maximize its health qualities, and continually research the latest means to enhance and refine the products they offer. Their range of TD4® low fat frozen yoghurts used in their smoothies contain live cultures such as Streptococcus Thermophillis as well as Lactobacillus Delbruekil for added nutritional benefits. Try some of Singapore’s favourites like the All Berry Bang, which includes blueberries, raspberries, strawberries, apple juice and TD4 strawberry yoghurt, as well as the Mango Magic that features mangoes, mango nectar, banana and TD4 vanilla yoghurt. If you are in need of an energy booster, Brekkie-To-Go-Go is the perfect choice, with ingredients such as banana, toasted museli, honey, low fat milk or soy and TD4 vanilla yoghurt, guaranteed to give you a great start to your day. Visit Boost Juice Bar Singapore for a revitalising treat today!

rafflescity.name: BreadTalk
rafflescity.description: BreadTalk is a Singaporean homegrown brand that has been imprinted fondly on Singapore’s food culture, firmly established as the go-to store for affordable and good quality variety of bread and cakes. Since its beginnings in 2000, BreadTalk honours the art of bread-making by giving life to their novel creations. They have no sign of slowing down as they continue to bring joy and goodness to satisfy every customer. BreakTalk’s premium and natural ingredients are carefully selected from global retailers such as procuring milled flour from Japan as well as pure butter from New Zealand. Pastes or fillings are made in the Central Kitchens at BreakTalk IHQ and the ingredients are specially processed from its raw states, so as to ensure greater quality control of the finished products. The best-selling buns include BreadTalk’s iconic Flosss Buns, the very bun that helped them gain traction in the hearts and tummies of many locals. There are also other creations like the Cheese Sausage and Cheese Boat buns, Bak Kwa Delight, as well as a variety of donut flavours. The products BreadTalk offers are made with a focus on creating perfect harmony among textures, flavours and ingredients. Stop by a BreadTalk outlet for a taste of Singapore’s favourite bakery now!

rafflescity.name: BROTHERBIRD BAKEHOUSE
rafflescity.description: Brotherbird's first bake-on-site unit where customers can expect freshly baked croissants on an hourly basis. With a spread of 15 flavours daily, and with monthly specials, the menu is never the same.

PRODUCTS AND SERVICES

Bakery & Confectionery , Pastries

rafflescity.name: Brotzeit
rafflescity.description:
Brotzeit’s taps started flowing in 2006 and have been bringing pure joy and German flavour to Singapore and surround ever since.


Expect authentic German dishes carefully crafted from only the best ingredients, your favourite German beer served up to perfection, in an environment that eludes what we Germans refer to as ‘Gemütlichkeit’ — it’s that warm, friendly, and fuzzy vibe that you get when a place feels just right.


Here at Brotzeit, German beer is running through our very veins; it is an important part of our DNA and few things are taken as seriously around here. From the sourcing of our beers to the matching glassware, to the pouring technique and maintenance of our draught lines, we strive for perfection and promise no less than that to our patrons. 


We cracked the code of the pork roast, which is one of the many things Germans have perfected. And the key to this meaty art is of course amazing crackling, something most recipes fall short on with Pork Knuckle. Impossibly tender, juicy pork meat on the bone, all wrapped in crispy crackling skin, Brotzeit’s slow-roasted, hind-leg Pork Knuckle comes with sauerkraut, potato salad, and richly-flavoured beer gravy.

rafflescity.name: Café&Meal MUJI
rafflescity.description:
Leveraging on the ideology of ’Simple Food is Delicious’, Café&Meal MUJI uses simple culinary treatment of fresh ingredients that highlights its natural goodness.


 In Singapore’s fast paced environment, many of us lack a well-balanced healthy diet. Hence MUJI Cafe sought to provide a selection of dishes made with these in mind – simplicity, quality, original, healthy and natural. 


Wholeheartedly believing in quality ingredients to be the key factor to great taste, MUJI Cafe sources from around the world for the best ingredients along with seasonal vegetables used for all its recipes.


Try out MUJI Cafe's 16-Grain Rice, a combination of Niigata Koshihikari Japanese white rice mixed with multi-grains, offering a plethora of vitamins A, B1 and B2, dietary fibre, with minerals that beautify and detoxify the body.

rafflescity.name: Cedele
rafflescity.description:
Cedele specializes in handmade, artisan baked goods. Founded on strong passion for cooking and baking, Cedele is a perfect blend of the two, introducing a quick-casual dining concept combining bakery cafes, all-day dining service restaurants and bakery kitchens.


At the core of Cedele lies its ethos “Eat Well, Be Well”, serving as a guiding principle for the food it makes, to hold great importance to physical nourishment as much as taste and affordability.


Featuring artisan baked goods, Cedele is a pioneer of healthy food options in Singapore. Using the freshest natural ingredients, the brand strongly discourages artificial, processed ingredients such as food colouring, improvers or premixes. From baked pastries such as Garlic Ciabatta and Wholemeal Bloomer to delectable cakes like Blue Pea Coconut Cake and Caramel Sea Salt Tiramisu Cake. Soups are also thickened naturally with vegetables.


Come by and treat your body to hearty and healthy artisan baked goods today!

Guided by the vision to connect everyone with a good cup of tea, the brand constantly innovates to provide healthy and delicious tea beverages to consumers. CHAGEE has since grown to over 4,500+ stores globally, with over 100+ stores across Malaysia, Singapore and Thailand. Its signature tea is Jasmine Green Milk Tea, which sells an average of over 100 million cups yearly.

tampinesmall.description:
Bengawan Solo is a homegrown brand that started in 1979 as Bengawan Solo Cake Shop in Marine Terrace by Tjendri Anastasia. What began as a simple interest in Indonesian delicacies became a full blown entrepreneurship when her cakes and kuehs gained popularity amongst family and friends. 


Bengawan Solo uses traditional methods of production and the only finest quality ingredients to prepare delicacies without preservatives. Even at the centralised kitchen, many of Bengawan Solo's products are still handmade or completed by hand in order to maintain the authenticity and standard of what they deliver to their customers. Kuehs like Ondeh Ondeh and Kueh Dadar are handmade throughout the process daily before distributing the finished products to the other outlets across Singapore. Bengawan Solo’s signature range also includes Pandan Chiffon Cake, Lapis Sagu, Kueh Lapis and Pineapple Tarts. Anastasia takes pride in producing Indonesian and local cakes as well as kuehs that are better and the best. Bengawan Solo continues to introduce new recipes and improve existing ones in order to keep their menu interesting. 


With 38 outlets and over 409 employees in Singapore, Bengawan Solo is not going to stop bringing traditional treats to you anytime soon!

tampinesmall.description:
Cut Butchery is a family owned 5-Star butchery. As importers and distributors to restaurants across the island, we bring you high quality meats and deli products at highly competitive rates. We are known for our friendly and honest service, selecting only the day’s freshest meat for sale to our customers. 


Instilled as part of our core values, we only insist on antibiotics-free, hormone-free and nitrate-free meat products. With no preservatives and cancer causing nitrates, we provide one of the cleanest, natural meats in Singapore. Cut Butchery promises pocket friendly high quality selections.

tampinesmall.name: Din Tai Fung
tampinesmall.description:
Established in the Shanxi Province of China, Ding Tai Fung was founded by gourmet food connoisseur Yang Bing-Yi. Since its inception in 1927, the household brand has received several accolades in recognition of its pursuit for gastronomy eminence. This includes the esteemed one-Michelin star award and commissioned as one of the Top Ten Restaurants by The New York Times in 1993. Since then, Din Tai Fung has established its footprints in key regions such as Hong Kong, China, Australia, Singapore and Malaysia. 


One of Din Tai Fung’s most reputed dishes would be the Xiao Long Bao – soup dumplings prepared in small bamboo steaming baskets. These golf-ball sized dumplings are made from a mixture of succulent minced pork and flavoursome pork broth. The precisely pleated 18-fold skin has been carefully engineered over the years to ensure that the skin does not burst prematurely during cooking. In addition, Din Tai Fung’s chefs undergo rigorous tests and trainings quarterly to ensure that standards are maintained. Some of Din Tai Fung’s noteworthy dishes such as the Steamed Chicken Soup, Green Chillies Stuffed with Marinated Minced Meat and other seasonal novelty dishes.


Indulge in some Xiao Long Baos at Tampines Mall’s Din Tai Fung today.

tampinesmall.name: Express Teppan-Yaki
tampinesmall.description: Express Teppan-Yaki was established by Hsu Fu Hua in Taiwan before the brand ventured overseas and set up branches in Singapore. This leading food and beverage business in Asia brought the concept of affordable, quick and delicious Teppan-Yaki to Singapore’s heartlands. With a vision to redefine the culture of consumption, the founder wishes to create a new consciousness for eating. Experience the phenomenon of fresh and quality food being cooked and served right in front of you, for you. At Teppan-Yaki, there are more than 10 variations of teppan-yaki ingredients that diners can enjoy, each providing a different flavour and experience to your meal. There are sets and ala carte options to the dishes, which come with vegetables that are cooked in a spicy and tasty black pepper sauce that enhances the main ingredients. Give their Teppan-Yaki Chicken Drumstick, Tenderloin Steak or Seafood Varieties a try, it is sure to tantalise your taste buds. There are also other seafood options like Squid with Garlic, Oyster Sautéed with Garlic and Fish Fillet. Express Teppan-Yaki also offers a Mushroom set for preferences other than meats and seafoods. Visit a Express Teppan-Yaki outlet in Singapore for a mouth-watering taste of Teppanyaki goodness!

tampinesmall.name: Garrett Popcorn Shops
tampinesmall.description:
Garrett Popcorn Shops® - A Chicago Tradition from the USA since 1949. 


For over seven decades, Garrett Popcorn Shops has served gourmet popcorn using wholesome ingredients in their secret family recipes, passed down for generations. Custom grown, non-GMO butterfly and mushroom kernels are first hot-air popped in their kitchens, then enriched with flavor in seasoned, old-fashioned Copper Kettles. Because good things take time, Garrett Popcorn is handcrafted in small batches throughout the day. 


Signature recipes include the fan-invented, original Chicago-style popcorn, Chicago Mix®, which blends the sweetness of CaramelCrisp™ with the savory goodness of CheeseCorn; plus Buttery (a vegan treat!), Plain, CheeseCorn, CaramelCrisp, Almond CaramelCrisp and Macadamia CaramelCrisp. 


Like no other™, Garrett Popcorn enchants adoring fans around the world.

westgate.name: An Acai Affair
westgate.description:
An Acai Affair was born out of a passion for healthy living in Singapore. They use fresh acai from the tropical plains of Brazil which encapsulates freshness with every bite. An Acai Affair offers an assortment of fresh ingredients, from house made almond butter to organic chia seeds and 100% natural granola. Acai berries have over 10 times more antioxidants than red grapes and can neutralise the damaging effects of free radicals throughout the body while helping you age gracefully. Not to mention, acai berries are also abundant in minerals and vitamins, like calcium and beta-carotene, which promotes healthy skin, hair and nails. 


An acai bowl is made up of an acai pulp base, a thick purple smoothie, topped with granola, fresh fruits and a variety of superfoods like goji berries and cacao nibs. Triple A is one of their signature bowls and it consists of acai with fresh fruits and superfoods such as almond flakes, pumpkin seeds and chia seeds. Another fan favourite is the Coco Glow, that is an acai layer with coconut sorbet, fresh fruits and superfoods. All their signature bowls come with your choice of drizzle, honey, cookie butter, peanut butter or almond butter. 


Come down to An Acai Affair at Westgate for a taste of pleasure and paradise.

westgate.name: Anjappar
westgate.description: Preserving the best culinary traditions of Chennai, Anjappar brings hearty North and South Indian cuisine to warm your stomach. With the perfect spice blend and secret home recipes, Anjappar will change your understanding of what is true Indian cuisine.

westgate.name: Astons Specialities
westgate.description: Astons Specialties was started with a simple aim – to bring quality yet affordable Western cuisine to diners everywhere in Singapore. Since 2005, Astons has been providing great food at reasonable prices, carving its name and popularity into the hearts of locals who often patronise the causal dining establishment. They offer an extensive menu that utilises the freshest and best quality ingredients, providing a satisfying experience for everyone. For starters, the Cream of Mushroom Soup is a good option and it comes with a slice of toasted fragrant garlic bread to tantalise your appetite. Other than their popular Prime Ribeye that is juicy and cooked to your preferred doneness, the Chargrilled Chicken is also a fan favourite amongst Singaporeans. The chicken is succulent and perfectly grilled so that the charred parts bring out the taste of the chicken and paired with their sauce flavourfully. Another must try includes the Honey Bourbon Ribs which is slathered generously with BBQ sauce and so tender the meat slides right off the bones. Most main courses include 2 side dishes and there are other seafood and pasta options available in their menu as well. Visit any Astons Specialties outlet in Singapore today for a great time with family and friends over amazing food!

westgate.name: Bebek Goreng Pak Ndut
westgate.description:
Bebek Goreng Pak Ndut Singapore serves authentic Indonesian food. All sauces are direct import from Indonesia to make it authentic.


Bebek Goreng Pak Ndut is about giving you great food. And it guarantees that once you have tasted its crispy fried duck that has been marinated for 24 hours, you will be wondering how you could have gone for so long without it.

westgate.name: Bingz 西少爷
westgate.description: Bingz(西少爷) was founded in 2014 by two Chinese programmers in Beijing. In the past 9 years, the restaurant has sold more than 80 million crispy burgers and is one of the Chinese brands with the most potential to go global.  Bingz (西少爷) is a global quick service provider offering delicious and convenient Chinese food to satisfy the taste buds of our customers.

westgate.name: BreadTalk
westgate.description: BreadTalk is a Singaporean homegrown brand that has been imprinted fondly on Singapore’s food culture, firmly established as the go-to store for affordable and good quality variety of bread and cakes. Since its beginnings in 2000, BreadTalk honours the art of bread-making by giving life to their novel creations. They have no sign of slowing down as they continue to bring joy and goodness to satisfy every customer. BreakTalk’s premium and natural ingredients are carefully selected from global retailers such as procuring milled flour from Japan as well as pure butter from New Zealand. Pastes or fillings are made in the Central Kitchens at BreakTalk IHQ and the ingredients are specially processed from its raw states, so as to ensure greater quality control of the finished products. The best-selling buns include BreadTalk’s iconic Flosss Buns, the very bun that helped them gain traction in the hearts and tummies of many locals. There are also other creations like the Cheese Sausage and Cheese Boat buns, Bak Kwa Delight, as well as a variety of donut flavours. The products BreadTalk offers are made with a focus on creating perfect harmony among textures, flavours and ingredients. Stop by a BreadTalk outlet for a taste of Singapore’s favourite bakery now!

westgate.name: Brotzeit
westgate.description: Brotzeit is a German Beer Bar and Restaurant offering authentic Bavarian cuisine in a contemporary yet chic setting. Enjoy signature German dishes like the Pork Curry Sausages and Crispy Oven Roasted Pork Knuckles over a chilled glass of beer. Try topping that for a fridate!

westgate.name: Buta Kizoku
westgate.description: With a wide selection of Japanese Kushiyaki 串焼き, ranging from Yakiton やきとん to Yakitori 焼き鳥, head over to Buta Kizoku for premium quality Japanese Skewers all within your pockets! And if you're feeling it, you have to pair those jumbo skewers with our alcohol selection!

westgate.name: Canton Paradise
westgate.description: Savour the essence of Hong Kong at Canton Paradise with a wide assortment of traditional favourites like noodle and congee dishes that will be sure to delight diners. Our rendition of congee dishes consist of a perfect combination of jasmine white rice grains with pearl rice grains, continuously boiled to achieve a smooth and silky texture and rich flavour. With a perfect control of the cooking temperature and preparation time of noodles, our chefs dish out plates of silky smooth noodles that will whet your appetite! Relish the finest Cantonese fare, soak up the bustling atmosphere and pursue the love affair with the best of Hong Kong at Canton Paradise.

westgate.name: Cat & the Fiddle
westgate.description:
From the culinary mastermind of Award-Winning Celebrity Pastry Chef Daniel Tay comes Cat & the Fiddle - Singapore’s First and Foremost Premium Cheesecake Retailer, the cheesecake specialist shop with its message of quality and affordability for all, and sustainability for the environment.


At Cat & the Fiddle, you’ll find a diverse selection of 20 varieties of gourmet
cheesecakes comprising faithful classics, Asian and local-inspired creations like Mao Shan Wang Durian Cheesecake, Mango Cheesecake and Milo Dinosaur Cheesecake, and even specially-composed medleys of our best-sellers, Fickle Feline, so you get to try 10 spectacular flavours in one neat cake! Perfect for birthdays, special occasions, and simply indulging, Cat & the Fiddle has every cheesecake lover’s whim and fancy catered for.

westgate.name: CHAFFIC
westgate.description:
CHAFFIC is an innovative Australian brand that combines Australia's finest natural produce with China's prominent tea brews, to create a healthy, tasty and refreshing bubble tea that is well-sought after.


We are discerning towards the selection of our ingredients, with each having to meet strict authenticity, quality, and sustainability criteria.


Our tea leaves hail from the fabled Fujian Wuyi Mountain. Each, carefully hand-picked, roasted and packed by tea masters who honed their craft for over 1,600 years. They are then complemented with the freshest Australian natural produce to elevate your modern tea appreciation experience.
